MD_gameFeatures_desc: Check out various images showcasing the features of Mage Duel!
MD_gameFeatures_desc2: For more details about Mage Duel, check out Game With!
MD_preregist_event_desc: Receive essential in-game items after pre-registering!
MD_preregist_event_privacyAgree: I agree to all terms including the collection and use of personal information.
MD_preregist_event_reward_attention: ※ Pre-registration reward items will be announced and distributed after the launch.
MD_preregist_guidepopup_desc: Keep up with the latest Mage Duel news on the official X account.
MD_worldview_desc: In the world of Mage Duel, where Vista, Genis, Lumine, and Medieta converge, intense battles unfold with various attack skills, powerful magic cards, extensive hero skills, and monster legion strategies.
MD_worldview_world1_desc: A sturdy world type that can deal damage to the opponent with various attack skills and maintain a solid balance with versatile cards for any strategy.
MD_worldview_world2_desc: A world type characterized by powerful magic cards with high attack power and HP recovery, overwhelming the opponent with early firepower.
MD_worldview_world3_desc: A world type equipped with a wide range of hero skills that enable summoning, activation, and equipping strategies, and utility that makes the strong even stronger.
MD_worldview_world4_desc: A world type that utilizes monsters with various abilities, relentlessly pressuring the opponent with a monster legion.
